channel.title: Notepad copy & paste problem
channel.description: This may be a wrong section but,my notepad that i use to code,if i copy something such as a code thats top down it comes out horizontal makeing a big long sentence. [code]Code: case 2500: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Message here.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;[/code] as you can see it completely scarmbled my words put it would go staright instead of this way createing one long run on sentence with one line. please help! :confused:

item.title: Notepad copy & paste problem
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

no that throws it all out of order see

[code]if(i == 8000){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”; class8.aString170 = “Armadyl kiteshield”; class8.aByteArray178 = “An ancient shield of Armadyl.”.getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 13695; class8.anInt181 = 1560; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 1104; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = -14; class8.anInt165 = 13696; class8.anInt200 = 13696; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1;}

[/code]

item.title: Notepad copy & paste problem
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

This may be a wrong section but,my notepad that i use to code,if i copy something such as a code thats top down it comes out horizontal makeing a big long sentence.

Code: case 2500: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Message here.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
as you can see it completely scarmbled my words put it would go staright instead of this way createing one long run on sentence with one line.
please help!

Read full topic
